siteMetadata.title: Team
siteMetadata.description: We don't just offer great compensation and flexibility, but the perfect mission, team and timing for you to build something that changes everything.

hero.title: We built Joystream
hero.subtitle: The community, technology, and products in Joystream were built over more than three years and 13 test networks of the team effort.

ourTeam.title: Our team
ourTeam.subtitle: We come from different continents, but share a passion for open source, blockchain technology, distributed systems, privacy and building a new internet based on accountable and forkable institutions.
